Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-55552 affecting package pytorch for versions less than 2.0.0-10
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-55552 affecting package pytorch for versions less than 2.0.0-10. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package pytorch is earlier than 2.0.0-10, affected by CVE-2025-55552
